name: Mediator Project File
summary: Learn about .MD8 files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Mediator MD8 project files may be saved with images and other resources referenced by the project.

description: File created by Mediator, a multimedia authoring application; saves the objects, page list, and events for the multimedia application; used for creating CD-ROM presentations, HTML webpages, and Flash applications.
